    • getHorse

      @GetMapping("/{horseId}") public HorseDto getHorse(@PathVariable Long horseId)
      Gets a horse by ID.
      Parameters:
      horseId - the ID of the horse to retrieve
      Returns:
      the horse as a data transfer object

    • updateHorse

      @PutMapping("/{horseId}") public HorseDto updateHorse(@PathVariable Long horseId, @RequestBody HorseDto horseDto)
      Updates a horse's details.
      Parameters:
      horseId - the ID of the horse to update
      horseDto - the data transfer object containing the new details
      Returns:
      the updated horse as a data transfer object

    • deleteHorse

      @DeleteMapping("/{horseId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> deleteHorse(@PathVariable Long horseId)
      Deletes a horse by ID.
      Parameters:
      horseId - the ID of the horse to delete
      Returns:
      a message confirming deletion

    • getHorsesNotFedForHours

      @GetMapping("/not-fed-for-hours") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<HorseDto>> getHorsesNotFedForHours(@RequestParam int hours)
      Fetches a list of horses that have not been fed for a specified number of hours.
      Parameters:
      hours - The number of hours to check against.
      Returns:
      A list of HorseDTOs representing horses that haven't been fed for the specified hours.

    • getHorsesWithIncompleteMeals

      @GetMapping("/incomplete-meals") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<HorseDto>> getHorsesWithIncompleteMeals()
      Retrieves a list of horses with incomplete meals.

      This endpoint fetches horses that haven't completed their meals. If any exception occurs during the process, it responds with an INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR status.

      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of HorseDto representing horses with incomplete meals, or an INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR status if an exception occurs.
